Translations.Text: Tyaca sathidara (saitana) mhanela ki he amacya palanakartya! Mi yala margabhrasta kele navhate, ulata ha svatahca duracya margabhrastateta hota
(Allaha) pharmavila ki, majhyasamora vadavivada karu naka. Mi tara adhica tumacyakade siksa - yataneca vayada pathavila hota
Majhyajavala gosta badalali jata nahi ani na mi apalya dasanvara (upasakanvara) kincitahi atyacara karanara ahe
Jya divasi amhi jahannamala vicaru ki kaya tu (purnatah) bharali? Ti uttara de'ila ki, anakhi kahi jasta ahe ka
Ani jannata, neka sadacari lokansathi agadi javala keli ja'ila kincitahi dura nasela
He ahe, jyaca vayada tumacyasi kela jata hota, asa tya pratyeka manasasathi, jo dhyanamagna ani niyamita (ajnapalana) karanara asela
Jo rahamana (dayavana allaha) ce guptapane bhaya rakhata asela ani ruju honare hrdaya ghe'una ala asela
Tumhi ya jannatamadhye santipurvaka dakhala vha. Ha nehami rahanyaca divasa ahe
He tithe je kahi icchitila te tyanna milela (kimbahuna) amacyajavala anakhihi jasta ahe
Ani tyancyapurvihi amhi aneka janasamuhanna nasta karuna takale ahe, je tyacyapeksa sakti samarthyata khupa jasta hote. Te saharamadhye phirataca rahile ki ekhade pala kadhanyace sthana ahe
Yata, tya pratyeka manasakarita bodha upadesa ahe, jo hrdaya balagata asela kinva laksapurvaka aikata asela ani to hajara asela
Nihsansaya, amhi akasancya ani dharaticya ani tya doghancya daramyana je kahi ahe, te sarva (phakta) saha divasanta nirmana kele, ani amhala thakavyane sparsahi kela nahi
Yastava tumhi tya gostinvara dhira-sanyama rakha ani apalya palanakartyace pavitryagana, prasansesaha suryodayapurvihi ani suryastapurvihi karita raha
Ani ratricya kahi kalatahi mahimagana kara ani namajanantarahi
Ani aika ki jya divasi eka pukaranara javalacya thikanahunaca pukarela
Jya divasi to bhayankara avaja khatripurvaka aikatila, ha bahera padanyaca divasa asela
Amhica jivanta karato ani amhica mrtyu deto ani amacyacakade paratuna yayace ahe
Jya divasi jamina vidirna ho'ila ani he dhavata palata (bahera padatila) he ekatrita karane amacyasathi phara sope ahe

Amhi cangalya prakare janato, je kahi he sangata aheta ani tumhi tyanna jabaradastipurvaka raji karuna ghenare nahi, tevha tumhi tyanna kura'anacya madhyamane samajavita raha, je majhya takidice bhaya
Sapatha ahe udavuna vikhuranaryam (varyam) ci
Maga ojhe ucalanaryanci
Maga dhimya gatine calanaryanci
Maga kamaci vatani karanaryanci
Nihsansaya, tumhala je vayade dile jatata (te sarva) khare aheta
Ani niscitaca n'yaya honara ahe
Sapatha ahe, marga rakhanarya akasaci
Niscitaca tumhi vibhinna gostita padala ahata
Tya (satya) pasuna toca phiravila jato, jo phiravila gela asava
Atakalicya gosti bolanare nasta kele gele
Je cetanahina aheta ani visara padalele
Vicaratata ki mobadalyaca divasa kevha ye'ila
(Hoya) ha to divasa ahe ki he agivara tapavile jatila
Svada cakha. Heca te, jyaci tumhi gha'i majavita hote
Nihsansaya, allahace bhaya balaganare jannatimmadhye ani (sitala) jharyammadhye asatila
Tyancya palanakartyane je kahi tyanna pradana kele ahe, te gheta asatila te tara tyapurvica satkarma karanare hote
Te ratri phara kami jhopata asata
Ani te ratricya antima prahari (pahate) ksama - yacana karita
Ani tyancya dhana-sampattita yacakanca(maganaryanca)ani yacana karanyapasuna alipta rahanaryanca hakka hota
Ani visvasa rakhanaryankarita tara dharatita aneka nisanya aheta
Ani svatah tumacya astitvata dekhila, tara kaya tumhi pahata nahita
Ani tumaci ajivika(anna samugri) ani jo tumhala vayada dila jata ahe, sarva akasata ahe
Tevha akasa ani dharaticya svami va palanakartyaci sapatha! He agadi satya ahe, aseca khatripurvaka, jase tumhi bolata
Kaya tumhala ibrahima (alaihis'salama) cya sanmanita atithinci vartahi pohacali ahe
Te jevha tyancyajavala ale tevha salama kela. (Ibrahima) yanni salamala uttara dile (ani mhanale, he tara) anolakhi loka aheta
Maga (gupacupa gha'igha'ine) apalya kutumbiyankade gele ani eka laththa vasaruce (mansa) ghe'una ale
Ani te tyancya pudhe thevale ani mhanale, tumhi khata ka nahi
Maga manatalya manata tyancyapasuna bhayabhita jhale. (Atithi) mhanale, tumhi bhi'u naka ani tyanna (hajarata) ibrahimala eka jnani putrapraptici subhavarta dili
Tevha tyancya patnine ascaryacakita ho'una apalya tondavara hata maruna mhatale ki mi tara mhatari ahe, tyacabarobara vanjha dekhila
Te mhanale ki hoya, tumacya palanakartya (allaha) ne aseca pharmavile ahe. Nihsansaya, to hikamasali ani jananara ahe
